      Daniel Ritter

      Software Engineer at Harvard Medical School, Oxford MsC in Computer Science ‘22, Brown Computer Science and Political Science ‘21

      • Boston, Massachusetts
      • Twitter
      • GitHub
      • Email

      About Me

      I'm currently a software engineer in the Debora Marks Lab at Harvard Medical School, working on applying machine learning methods to problems in biological sequence modeling. Previously, I received my master's in computer science from the University of Oxford, and before that studied computer science and political science at Brown University.
